channel.title: Bosses anims and teleporting pages
channel.description:
Hello guys :) i'm running a 317 server and i don't know how to add anims to my custom bosses and i don't also know how to add a teleporting page, like 'next' and then u go to a next page...
Already thanks bro's :)

item.title: Bosses anims and teleporting pages
item.dc:creator: @jummppy jummppy
item.description:
@jummppy wrote:

Make the dialogue option to 4 or 5 assign it an action too. On the last option make it say more options. Then click on it and find the case number inside clickingbuttons.

Read full topic

item.title: Bosses anims and teleporting pages
item.dc:creator: @qeruina qeruina
item.description:
@qeruina wrote:

heh, i’m very new to coding… can you send me your skype name? i would REALLY apreciate it if you want to help me

Read full topic

item.title: Bosses anims and teleporting pages
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

Do some googling for the custom boss animations you can easily find them. As for the tele pages i believe your talking about the dialogues that show up more options when you click more options, just make the last case send more dialogues. I would go in more depth on how to do this but its really not that hard even for me. If i can find it myself then you can easily. Goodluck unless someone gives you a more in depth explanation

Read full topic
